name: Flappy Square?
description:
You are a square, and some how you can flap?

Oh what is that? A score placed conveniently at the top of the screen?

So many questions, so many mysteries to find out! I guess you are just gonna have to play the game and your questions, will be answered.

Yes this is totally a Flappy Bird remake, please don't judge me, I can explain! I am an aspiring indie developer who wants to make a fresh start with Unity. Its an engine I've never used before and would love to learn the ins and outs on how to make your creation come true in such a unique engine! Its an engine I have always wanted to learn, and my journey starts here! With a Flappy Bird remake... Sounds a bit awful when I think that out loud, but we all have to start somewhere!

Consider supporting the game as I plan to purchase a Google Play license and have it developed and ported to mobile! Anything helps! Thanks for playing, hope you find some form of entertainment from this small game!

Disclaimer:

Ignore the "Development Build" title. It was the only way I could successfully upload this game without long Unity loading times which started randomly happening as I went to upload the game to Itch...
